original_text: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
korean_text: 한 마디도 대답하지 아니하시니 총독이 크게 놀라워하더라

sentences.original_text: And he answered him to never a word
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그에게 한 마디도 대답하지 않았고

sentences.original_text: insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly
